title.narrative: Assistance to flood victims in the Republic of Ghana

description.narrative:
2. Development of WASH plan: Based on the findings of the detailed assessment on WASH, a detailed WASH plan will be developed. It is worth to note that there is already a WASH contingency plan available. This plan was however based on assumptions so the detailed WASH plan will consider the actual situation on the ground and the material requirements. While this is going on, the contingency plan will be implemented. Once the detailed plan is completed, it will be the blueprint and the contingency plan discontinued. The detailed plan will be built upon the contingency plan and will highlight the supply requirements, the human resource needs, identify stakeholders and collaborators as well as the roadmap towards achieving the set objectives.
**** Start date backdated to 02/10/2007.
